LanguageData.RecruitPrisonerChance.label: recruit prisoner chance
LanguageData.RecruitPrisonerChance.description: Base chance this person will recruit a prisoner.
LanguageData.TameAnimalChance.label: tame animal chance
LanguageData.TameAnimalChance.description: Base chance this person will tame an animal.
LanguageData.TrainAnimalChance.label: train animal chance
LanguageData.TrainAnimalChance.description: Base chance this person will make progress training an animal on a given attempt. The actual chance for a given attempt will also depend on the animal's wildness, whether it is bonded with the trainer, and so on.
LanguageData.SocialImpact.label: social chat impact
LanguageData.SocialImpact.description: When this person interacts socially, this is how much the other person is affected.
LanguageData.DiplomacyPower.label: diplomacy power
LanguageData.DiplomacyPower.description: How effective this person is as a negotiator. Affects the impact on faction relations when this person gives gifts to another faction. It also affects the outcome of peace talks with other factions.
LanguageData.TradePriceImprovement.label: trade price improvement
LanguageData.TradePriceImprovement.description: When this person negotiates prices, buy and sell prices are improved by this percentage.
